dEqvasyAqha(gm) sa#viqtuH pra#saqvE bRuhaqspati#nA vAjaqjitAq vAja#M jEShaM dEqvasyAqha(gm) sa#viqtuH pra#saqvE bRuhaqspati#nA vAjaqjitAq var.Shi#ShThaqM nAka(gm)# ruhEyaqmindrA#yaq vAca#M ~MvadaqtEndraqM vAja#M jApayaqtEndrOq vAja#majayit || 
aSvA#jani vAjiniq vAjE#Shu vAjinIvaqtyaSvA$n thsaqmathsu# vAjaya || 
arvA#siq sapti#rasi vAqjya#siq vAji#nOq vAja#M dhAvata maqrutA$M prasaqvE ja#yataq viyOja#nA mimIddhvaqmaddhva#naH skaBnItaq - [  ] 34
